title: Bus Stand
description: Garbage piles near waiting areas, emitting a foul smell.

title: Market Area
description: Rotting vegetable waste and overflowing dustbins attracting flies.

title: Hospital Entrance
description: Discarded medical waste and pan-stained walls.

title: Slum Area
description: Open sewage lines and scattered household waste.

title: School Playground
description: Broken glass pieces and plastic waste near play equipment.
